page.title: 15POPULATION IN STOCKTON.
page.content: TWO IMPORTANT FEATURES OF PRESENT POPULATION EMERGED FROM A 98% SAMPLE OF 87 HOUSEHOLDS: 1. THE "LOCAL" CHARACTER OF THE INHABITANTS. 2.THE TOP HEAVY NATURE OF THE AGE STRUCTURE OF HOUSEHOLDS. 67% OF MEN WERE BORN IN THE PARISH & 27% IN THE ADJOING 3 PARISHES.25% OF THE WOMEN WERE NATIVE,43% FROM NEIGHBOURING PARISHES;89% OF HOUSEHOLDS LIVED IN THE PARISH OVER 15 YEARS. 17% ARE AGED O-9YEARS,1O% 1O-19,19% 2O-39, 22% 39-6O & 29% OVER 65.THE SURVEY SHOWS AN AGEING POPULATION WITH A SMALL POTENTIALLY REPRODUCTIVE GROUP WHICH MEANS PRESENT TRENDS ARE UNLIKELY TO CHANGE.THE 2 PERSON HOUSEHOLD IS DOMINANT (38%) WITH 58% OF ALL HOUSEHOLDS BEING 1OR 2 PERSONS.MANY OF THE YOUNG MOVE AWAY TO FIND HOUSING OR EMPLOYMENT.
